attributes.title: Win Rate by Team
attributes.visState: {"title": "Win Rate by Team", "type": "horizontal_bar", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "params": {"field": "win_rate_last5", "customLabel": "Win Rate"}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "team_name.keyword", "orderBy": "1", "order": "desc", "size": 30, "customLabel": "Team"}, "schema": "segment"}], "params": {"type": "horizontal_bar", "grid": {"categoryLines": false}, "categoryAxes": [{"id": "CategoryAxis-1", "type": "category", "position": "left", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "valueAxes": [{"id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "type": "value", "position": "bottom", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {"text": "Win Rate"}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "seriesParams": [{"show": true, "type": "histogram", "mode": "stacked", "data": {"label": "Win Rate", "id": "1"}, "valueAxis": "ValueAxis-1", "drawLinesBetweenPoints": true, "lineWidth": 2, "showCircles": true}], "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": false, "legendPosition": "right", "times": [], "addTimeMarker": false, "labels": {"show": false}, "thresholdLine": {"show": false, "value": 10, "width": 1, "style": "full", "color": "#E7664C"}}}

attributes.title: Average Points Last 5 Games
attributes.visState: {"title": "Average Points Last 5 Games", "type": "horizontal_bar", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "params": {"field": "avg_points_last5", "customLabel": "Avg Points Last 5"}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "team_name.keyword", "orderBy": "1", "order": "desc", "size": 30, "customLabel": "Team"}, "schema": "segment"}], "params": {"type": "horizontal_bar", "grid": {"categoryLines": false}, "categoryAxes": [{"id": "CategoryAxis-1", "type": "category", "position": "left", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "valueAxes": [{"id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "type": "value", "position": "bottom", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {"text": "Avg Points"}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "seriesParams": [{"show": true, "type": "histogram", "mode": "stacked", "data": {"label": "Avg Points Last 5", "id": "1"}, "valueAxis": "ValueAxis-1", "drawLinesBetweenPoints": true, "lineWidth": 2, "showCircles": true}], "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": false, "legendPosition": "right", "times": [], "addTimeMarker": false, "labels": {"show": false}, "thresholdLine": {"show": false, "value": 10, "width": 1, "style": "full", "color": "#E7664C"}}}

attributes.title: Home vs Away Performance
attributes.visState: {"title": "Home vs Away Performance", "type": "pie", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "params": {"customLabel": "Games"}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "is_home", "orderBy": "1", "order": "desc", "size": 2, "customLabel": "Home (1) / Away (0)"}, "schema": "segment"}], "params": {"type": "pie", "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": true, "legendPosition": "right", "isDonut": false, "labels": {"show": true, "values": true, "last_level": true, "truncate": 100}}}

attributes.title: Win Probability Distribution
attributes.visState: {"title": "Win Probability Distribution", "type": "histogram", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "count", "params": {"customLabel": "Matches"}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "histogram", "params": {"field": "win_probability_home", "interval": 0.1, "customLabel": "Win Probability", "min_doc_count": 0, "extended_bounds": {"min": 0, "max": 1}}, "schema": "segment"}], "params": {"type": "histogram", "grid": {"categoryLines": false}, "categoryAxes": [{"id": "CategoryAxis-1", "type": "category", "position": "bottom", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {"text": "Win Probability Home"}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "valueAxes": [{"id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "type": "value", "position": "left", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {"text": "Count"}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "seriesParams": [{"show": true, "type": "histogram", "mode": "stacked", "data": {"label": "Matches", "id": "1"}, "valueAxis": "ValueAxis-1", "drawLinesBetweenPoints": true, "lineWidth": 2, "showCircles": true}], "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": false, "legendPosition": "right", "times": [], "addTimeMarker": false, "labels": {"show": false}, "thresholdLine": {"show": false, "value": 10, "width": 1, "style": "full", "color": "#E7664C"}}}

attributes.title: Rest Days vs Win Rate
attributes.visState: {"title": "Rest Days vs Win Rate", "type": "line", "aggs": [{"id": "1", "enabled": true, "type": "avg", "params": {"field": "win_rate_last5", "customLabel": "Win Rate"}, "schema": "metric"}, {"id": "2", "enabled": true, "type": "terms", "params": {"field": "rest_days", "orderBy": "_key", "order": "asc", "size": 10, "customLabel": "Rest Days"}, "schema": "segment"}], "params": {"type": "line", "grid": {"categoryLines": false, "style": {"color": "#eee"}}, "categoryAxes": [{"id": "CategoryAxis-1", "type": "category", "position": "bottom", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {"text": "Rest Days"}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "valueAxes": [{"id": "ValueAxis-1", "name": "LeftAxis-1", "type": "value", "position": "left", "show": true, "labels": {"show": true, "truncate": 100}, "title": {"text": "Win Rate"}, "scale": {"type": "linear"}}], "seriesParams": [{"show": true, "type": "line", "mode": "normal", "data": {"label": "Win Rate", "id": "1"}, "valueAxis": "ValueAxis-1", "drawLinesBetweenPoints": true, "lineWidth": 2, "interpolate": "linear", "showCircles": true}], "addTooltip": true, "addLegend": false, "legendPosition": "right", "times": [], "addTimeMarker": false, "labels": {"show": false}, "thresholdLine": {"show": false, "value": 10, "width": 1, "style": "full", "color": "#E7664C"}}}
